name: @cyntientops/cursor
description: CyntientOps TypeScript/React Native implementation with complete data parity

scripts.env:check: echo 'Node:' $(node -v) 'npm:' $(npm -v) 'yarn:' $(yarn -v) && echo 'FastSSD cache:' $(ls -la '/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache' 2>/dev/null || echo 'MISSING') && cd apps/mobile-rn && npx expo-doctor
scripts.mobile:kill-ports: bash -lc 'lsof -nP -i:8081 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19000 -t | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -nP -i:19001 -t | xargs -r kill -9'
scripts.mobile:clean:caches: bash -lc 'watchman watch-del-all 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache $TMPDIR/haste-map-* $TMPDIR/react-* ~/.expo/* ~/.cache/expo/* apps/mobile-rn/.expo; echo Caches cleared'
scripts.mobile:start:clean: yarn mobile:kill-ports && yarn mobile:clean:caches && yarn mobile:start:fast:clear
scripts.mobile:setup:force: yarn install && cd apps/mobile-rn && yarn expo install --non-interactive
scripts.mobile:clean: cd apps/mobile-rn && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* || true
scripts.mobile:start:fast: cd apps/mobile-rn && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" yarn expo start --dev-client
scripts.mobile:start:fast:clear: cd apps/mobile-rn && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" yarn expo start -c --dev-client
scripts.mobile:start:ultra-fast: cd apps/mobile-rn && EXPO_DEV_SERVER_PORT=19000 RCT_METRO_PORT=8081 METRO_CACHE_ROOT="/Volumes/FastSSD/Developer/_devdata/metro-cache" NODE_ENV=development yarn expo start --dev-client --minify=false
scripts.mobile:bundle:analyze: cd apps/mobile-rn && yarn expo export --platform all --output-dir ../../dist/bundle-analysis && yarn react-native-bundle-visualizer ../../dist/bundle-analysis
scripts.mobile:bundle:size: cd apps/mobile-rn && yarn expo export --platform all --output-dir ../../dist/bundle-size && du -sh ../../dist/bundle-size/*
scripts.clean: nx reset && rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.install:apps: echo 'Use yarn install at repo root; this script is deprecated.'
scripts.install:packages: echo 'Use yarn install at repo root; per-package installs are deprecated.'

author: CyntientOps Team
